Epic day was epic we started the morning at 6 and at 6:20 we had a irish breakfast with a few cups of tea with rum in it was a normal working day till half day then watched a football match while having a few then went down till the naffy and had a few beers with the lads till silly oclock

@sppt wrote:

Teh Spede:

Wow… I dont have any recollection about posting It’s was pretty quiet here in cambridge untill we found an awesome bar! I tried to get this guinness hat off this irish guy but he took it away from me and my friendgirls went and got it from him and i was pissed at them for the whole night.

Hate to break it to you, but…

You got drugged with GHB, and then you got gangraped by multiple niggers

item.title: Booyahh
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

How drunk I got… hmmm

Woke up, had a blueberry cider at 12. Went to friends house and had a little bit of wrongbow. Went to student union had 2 pints snakebite, went to yates’ had 3 pints guiness and got a free burger and chips. Went to spoons and managed to sweet talk the barman in to giving me a free hat. Got a kopparberg.

Girl in pikachu outfit came in to bar, chatted her up(I say that but I was pretty drunk so it was probably more like stalking)

Met some guys from the US navy who were in port for tonight. Asked what it’s like to sleep in a tiny bunk with loads of other dudes and how they fap. Apparently when you’re in your bunk nobody dares disturb you…

Police walked past our table and I flipped them off while they were walking away. I don’t know how but one of them noticed me and came over and interrogated us all. The moody one bent down to pick something up and put his head between my legs so naturally I said “hey hey ;)”. That really pissed him off. Started having a go at me saying “Do you think you’re being smart” I said “No why what’s wrong” he said “Well it’s not smart to ask a policeman to give you a headjob” Everyone laughed and I was like “The hell is a headjob?”.

He had picked up a bottle of vodka that someone left under our table and he tried to pin it on us. Eventually he told the barstaff they aren’t allowed to serve me because I’m too drunk. Fair enough and they left. 5 minutes later got my friend to purchase a drink for me. About half an hour later the police walked back in and told me to gtfo. Ended up having a massive argument outside the bar with them and very nearly got put in a cell after calling the policeman an asshat. He was like “you are drunk, it’s okay to be intoxicated” and I said what’s the difference and he was like “one means you have alcohol in your system” and I was like “The fuck are you talking about both of those things mean you have alcohol in your system”. Luckily my friend pulled me away.

Went off to a bar far away, soon as I walked in some woman asked to buy my hat, got talking to her and she saw the cuts on my arm. Ended up getting her number, she was 31 and going through a divorce ;). COUGAR

After that went to some other bar and tried and failed chatting up another girl. I must have been so embarrassing I was so drunk. Eventually bar closed and my friends had to drag me out of it. After that I don’t know why but I jumped a fence running from my friends and got cuts all over me and my toe hurts like shit.

tags - free burger, free hat, lots of drink, pikachu, arguing with police, cougar, girls, jumping fence

Read full topic
